metadata.Title: CVE-2011-0765 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in lft in pWhois Layer Four Traceroute (LFT) 3.xbefore 3.3 allows local users to gain privileges via a crafted commandline.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-0765` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

lft - 3.8-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: lft package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.8-2').
